description:
This is part 1 of 4 of November’s live show with Chloe and Payton. The show starts off with the the usual warm up, the strap escape. Flexibility is an advantage and I like to use fear as a motivator. Either way, we all win. One is rewarded and the other punished.

After being worn out from the escape Payton gets the pleasure of enduring the squat position. She is locked into place, ankles, wrists and throat. A fucksall is added to the mix. Nipples being tugged by her toes and caned to our liking. Watch Payton sweat from holding the position while being vigorously fucked.
title: Reward and punishment are synonymous when the goal is pleasing us.
